body.name: 1500W Handheld Steamer for Clothes, 3 Modes Clothes Steamer with 300ml Big Capacity, 15s Quick Heat Portable Travel Steamer with Strong Penetrating Steam, Fabric Wrinkle Remover for Home|Travel|Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 59 mins
features: 🌈𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭＆𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥: In just 15 seconds, clothes steamer effortlessly smooths wrinkles on suits, shirts, skirts, and more with hot steam. Save time each morning for a quick and polished start!

🌈５𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐎𝐧𝐜𝐞: The 300ml tank of steamer for clothes allows continuous ironing for up to 20 minutes! Iron 5-6 sets of clothes at once. No need for frequent refills of water. Enjoy a smoother ironing experience with Teacone portable steamer!

🌈３ 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐥𝐥 𝐅𝐚𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐜: Teacone steam iron features low, medium, and high modes, offering different steam levels. Choose low for spring/summer with light clothes, and mid/high for fall/winter with heavier garments. The most powerful steam iron available, with its highest-grade steam reaching deep into hard-to-reach fabric areas, effectively eliminating odors. Our handheld steamer caters to your every need.

🌈𝐀 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫: Our lightweight steam iron goes wherever you go (1.87 pounds, 6.41 x 5.31 x 10.55 inches). Easily pack travel steamer in your suitcase while traveling. Store clothes steamer anywhere at home with convenience. Own the steamer for clothes for a lighter travel and a tidier home!

🌈𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞＆𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥: Our clothes steamer comes with insulated gloves, a measuring cup, and a 2-in-1 brush. Our steam iron has a safety set to prevent overheating. This ensures that your favorite clothes remain undamaged. What's even better, the 5-foot power cord of steamer for clothes provides freedom of movement while ironing. Enjoy a fresh outfit antime!

🌈𝐒𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐆𝐮𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐞 Confident our steamer for clothes brings satisfaction to you and your loved ones. Of course! You can return the clothes steamer hassle-free. Whether as a gift or for personal use, our 3-year warranty and professional customer service team ensure a smooth and risk-free experience at all times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best steamer I have ever owned!
reviews.reviewText: So happy with this steamer. Although it's a little heavy, it works so very well it doesn't make it a problem for me! You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My First Ever Steamer... Happy Customer!
reviews.reviewText: Believe it or not, I've never owned a steamer in my life. I've always found regular irons so tedious to use. Because of this, I would often end up wearing wrinkly clothes. And we all know that wrinkly clothes can quickly take a 10/10 outfit down to a 5/10. I I told myself, "no more! I'm getting myself a steamer once and for all." I searched Amazon for an affordable yet effective steamer, and that's when I stumbled upon this steamer... Price point and great reviews won me over. And let me tell you, I I am very satisfied!2 things that I love about this steamer:1. Attachments: It comes with additional attachments. You're not just limited to plain steam; You'll have a 2-in-1 brush too. These attachments allow me to steam different types of fabric more effectively.2. Horizontal Steaming: The standard method of steaming is usually hanging the clothing on a hanger, and steaming vertically. I love this steamer cos you can also use it horizontally, meaning the clothing is laying on a flat service. Me for instance, I often steam clothes right on my bed!! Super convenient!I've been using this steamer for about a month now, and I can confidently say that it has exceeded my expectations. It's a game-changer for someone like me who always found ironing a hassle. Well... that's it for this review! Hope I helped in your decision-making.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This is fantastic for travel when you need your clothes looking their best. It can easily be packed into a checked luggage bag for easy transport.The reservoir for it is spacious and holds a good amount of water. It heats up in less than a minute and works like a charm to get out stubborn wrinkles. I was able to steam a wedding dress in around 20 minutes (which seems like a lot but is actually pretty good timing for a handheld!) It comes with several different nozzle attachments, but I admittedly haven’t used those yet. The cord length is decent; and long enough for most people to effectively steam their garments.If you follow the instructions, you will see just how easy operation is with this steamer. I highly recommend it for home or on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good steam and able to control 3 modes of steam
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this steam to replace my old steam that only had one setting which was full blast. I need a lower setting for different types of clothing material as low steam is needed not to damage the fabric. Plug in let steam warm up and select your power.

reviews.reviewText: Good quality product at the right price. Other brands some own brands maybe cheaper but having tried most of them it pays both in a quality finish, time and money really to buy quality in particular if possible in bulk.
